an8.69:1.3: Khattiyaparisa, brahmanaparisa, gahapatiparisa, samanaparisa, catumaharajikaparisa, tavatimsaparisa, maraparisa, brahmaparisa.
an8.69:1.4: Abhijanami kho panaham, bhikkhave, anekasatam khattiyaparisam upasankamita.
an8.69:1.5: Tatrapi maya sannisinnapubbanceva sallapitapubbanca sakaccha ca samapannapubba.
an8.69:1.6: Tattha yadisako tesam vanno hoti tadisako mayham vanno hoti, yadisako tesam saro hoti tadisako mayham saro hoti.
an8.69:1.7: Dhammiya ca kathaya sandassemi samadapemi samuttejemi sampahamsemi.
an8.69:1.9: ‘ko nu kho ayam bhasati devo va manusso va’ti.
an8.69:1.10: Dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva antaradhayami.
an8.69:1.12: ‘ko nu kho ayam antarahito devo va manusso va’ti.
an8.69:2.1: Abhijanami kho panaham, bhikkhave, anekasatam brahmanaparisam …pe…
an8.69:2.8: Tatrapi maya sannisinnapubbanceva sallapitapubbanca sakaccha ca samapannapubba.
an8.69:2.9: Tattha yadisako tesam vanno hoti tadisako mayham vanno hoti, yadisako tesam saro hoti tadisako mayham saro hoti.
an8.69:2.10: Dhammiya ca kathaya sandassemi samadapemi samuttejemi sampahamsemi.
an8.69:2.12: ‘ko nu kho ayam bhasati devo va manusso va’ti.
an8.69:2.13: Dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva antaradhayami.
an8.69:2.15: ‘ko nu kho ayam antarahito devo va manusso va’ti.
